Seasonal flu shot information
 Disenrollment Information
To request disenrollment from your plan and switch to Original Medicare only, you have two options to choose from: 
1. Disenrollment Form (Online) – Fill out the form and submit the request online.
2. Disenrollment Form (PDF)(75.9 KB) – Print the PDF form. Fill it out in black/blue ink. Mail or fax it using the directions on the form.

You can also search for a physician, facility or medical group online and print directory results based on your specific search criteria. Search for a provider
Please note: You should enter your ZIP code and select your plan to search for providers online. If you choose to view another ZIP code or plan, the results may not apply.
